item.title: Torva helm dissapear? o.O
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

soz if this is in wrong spot flamerz but ummm… i added this to my ints…
(ok i edited the inv model to show right but as for the actual model im clueless of how to edit… this is what ive got so far)

11kjpm8.png756×531

[QUOTE]case 3275:
itemDef.modelID =57785;
itemDef.name = “Torva full helm”;
itemDef.description = “Torva full helm”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 672;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62738;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62754;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.actions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.actions[4] = “Drop”;
itemDef.anInt175 = 62729;
itemDef.anInt197 = 62729;
break;[/QUOTE]

and it showd errors so i changed it to this…

[QUOTE] case 3275:
itemDef.modelID = 57785;
itemDef.name = “Torva full helm”;
itemDef.description = “Torva full helm.”.getBytes();//examine.
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 20;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 10;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62738;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62754;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;[/QUOTE]

o.O any idea how to fix??
